name: The Personal Reasons
description:
Lewis Foster is a nineteen-year-old student at a private university. His carefree life quietly goes on as usual, until one September morning a crime occurs on the university grounds, which seems to change the life of every student. The headmistress does everything to hide the incident from the public, but sooner or later everything secret becomes clear, as you know.

Immerse yourself in a story about youth and friendship, about betrayal and violence, about the past and the future. Throughout the game you will face different choices that will affect not only the development of the dialogue, but also the further plot. This project contains elements of "Point & Click" - carefully examine the objects and personal belongings of the characters to learn something new.

Meet people you've never known before. Be careful and reckless. Go back to the beginning to complete your story.

What should I do if someone knows more than they say?



  • 3 long episodes
  • 12+ unique characters
  • 15 interesting achievements
  • Various locations from landscapes to classrooms
  • Many thoughtful plot details that will help to get to the truth
  • The atmosphere of the student life, humour and memories of youth
